description:
Akito is the main character of this story, and http://anidb.net/ch45097 [Akiko]`s twin brother. He`s a sophomore at Saint Liliana Academy with average looks and average grades. It`s been six years since he last saw his sister, and now the two of them are living together. Others say he has a sister complex, but he doesn`t think so.
However, unbeknownst to Akiko, Akito is adopted, and therefore they are not twins.
Source: ANN
name: Himenokouji Akito
